venue.name: Cuvee - A Food, Wine and Champagne Room

item.description:
Cuvee is such a good place for Happy Hour because EVERYTHING is half off. Wine, drinks, food, everything! BUT we need to keep in mind a few things. I imagine people will want separate checks, so let's be nice to the server but make a polite request. Also, it took a while to get food because of how busy it was because of how great of a deal they have. So Happy Hour starts at 5 and I'd like to get there at 5 - the earlier the better. I know a lot of people can't do 5pm, but I will say that if there is an early bunch, we'll go ahead and order, and the people that arrive later can order later. I hate doing this, but if we wait until after 6 to start to order, it takes quite a while to get food. I'm going to cross post this with another group I am in, so I'll split the spots half and half and if I need to adjust, I will.
